name: ROYAL CAPE ONE-DESIGN (RCOD)

images.alt: Royal Cape One-Design photo on sailboatdata.com
Royal Cape One-Design drawing on sailboatdata.com

notes: First designed for single chined plywood construction. Based on the ZEESLANG ('Sea Snake' vds #58 - 1956).  A round-bilged version was later built of fiberglass. Built, and seen mostly in South Africa. It is what would later be called an ULBD and decades ahead of it's time. Despite the name, the RCOD was never actually raced as a one-design class.
